name: Return of a Crazy Genius Composer
author: Haesol &#40정해솔&#41
content: Success, fame, family… In an instant, the genius composer, Min Hyunseung, lost it all. On the brink of death… he wanted to live a different life, one where all those continuous misfortunes couldn’t just be claimed as karma.“How did this happen…?”He was given another chance to live.
